text: Kiya inn logon ney aisay (Allah kay) shareek (muqarrar ker rakhay) hain jinhon ney aisay ehkaam-e-deen muqarrar ker diyey hain jo Allah kay famaye huye nahi hain. Agar faislay kay din ka wada na hota to (abhi hi) inn mein faisla ker diya jata. Yaqeenan (inn) zalimon kay liye hi dard-naak azab hai
